double-slap.name: Double Slap
double-slap.description: Hit 2 times for 5 damage each. (Front row)

comet-punch.name: Comet Punch
comet-punch.description: Hit 2 times for 5 damage each. (Front row)

fury-attack.name: Fury Attack
fury-attack.description: Hit 3 times for 3 damage each. (Front row)

fury-swipes.name: Fury Swipes
fury-swipes.description: Hit 3 times for 3 damage each. (Front row)

spike-cannon.name: Spike Cannon
spike-cannon.description: Hit 4 times for 3 damage each. (Front row)

barrage.name: Barrage
barrage.description: Hit 4 times for 3 damage each. (Front row)

self-destruct.name: Self Destruct
self-destruct.description: Deal 35 damage to all enemies. User faints.

explosion.name: Explosion
explosion.description: Deal 50 damage to all enemies. User faints.

super-fang.name: Super Fang
super-fang.description: Deal damage equal to 50% of target's current HP.

guillotine.name: Guillotine
guillotine.description: Deal damage equal to 75% of target's max HP. Vanish.

horn-drill.name: Horn Drill
horn-drill.description: Deal damage equal to 75% of target's max HP. Vanish.

twineedle.name: Twineedle
twineedle.description: Hit 2 times for 4 damage each. Apply Poison 1. (Front row)

pin-missile.name: Pin Missile
pin-missile.description: Hit 4 times for 3 damage each. (Front row)

leech-life.name: Leech Life
leech-life.description: Deal 7 damage. Heal 50% of damage dealt.

thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt
thunderbolt.description: Deal 11 damage to an entire row.

double-kick.name: Double Kick
double-kick.description: Hit 2 times for 4 damage each. (Front row)

rolling-kick.name: Rolling Kick
rolling-kick.description: Deal 6 damage to all enemies in a column.

seismic-toss.name: Seismic Toss
seismic-toss.description: Deal 20 fixed damage to all enemies in a column. Vanish.

flamethrower.name: Flamethrower
flamethrower.description: Deal 11 damage to all enemies in a column.

absorb.name: Absorb
absorb.description: Deal 5 damage. Heal 50% of damage dealt.

mega-drain.name: Mega Drain
mega-drain.description: Deal 7 damage. Heal 50% of damage dealt.

bonemerang.name: Bonemerang
bonemerang.description: Hit 2 times for 5 damage each. (Front row)

fissure.name: Fissure
fissure.description: Deal damage equal to 50% of target's max HP. Vanish.

poison-gas.name: Poison Gas
poison-gas.description: Apply Poison 1 to entire front row.

dream-eater.name: Dream Eater
dream-eater.description: Deal 12 damage. Heal 50% of damage dealt.

rest.name: Rest
rest.description: Heal 50% of max HP. Apply Sleep 2 to self. Vanish.

rock-slide.name: Rock Slide
rock-slide.description: Deal 9 damage to entire front row.
